meanings.definition: The pointed tip of a bird's wing.
meanings.sent1: The bird soared gracefully, showing off its sleek wingtip.
meanings.sent2: I found a feather with a delicate wingtip on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to balance a nut on the wingtip of a statue.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight, reaching the wingtip of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with hues that touched the wingtip of dusk.

meanings.definition: A style of shoe characterized by a pointed toe cap that extends along the sides of the shoe.
meanings.sent1: She admired the elegant design of the wingtip on his shoes.
meanings.sent2: The classic wingtip shoes added a touch of sophistication to his outfit.
meanings.sent3: The clown wore oversized wingtip shoes, causing laughter wherever he walked.
meanings.sent4: His words danced around the room, tapping the wingtip of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The old photograph captured the shiny wingtip shoes of a bygone era.
